context: Dear Sir/Ma'am, Do you know if I can connect external Hard drive is there UBS connection? Because 4GB v low.
response: You probably know by now, but the easiest solution to more storage is a 16gb USB flash drive. You just plug it into the USB port on the rear. There are two ports, so you can add two 16gb flash drives for 32gb of storage.

context: So I'm guessing if the game is designed for higher accuracy WHEN aiming, this isn't going to help much. Is that right?
response: Correct. Also in games like BF4, for example, some of the vehicle and weapon crosshairs are not directly centered on your screen.

context: Does it come with the wrist strap?
response: Yes, it does include the wrist strap.

context: For multiplayer does every need the game, or is this a multiplayer single cartridge game?
response: The only multiplayer feature this game really has is Kirby Fighters. People who do have the game can choose from 1 of 10 copy abilities to use in battle. People without can only select Sword and Cutter.

context: will hoyle card game play on windows 8?
response: Windows 8 is not listed as an option on the box, I use it on Windows 7, hope this helps.

context: On the Silver Cherry MX Red (CH-9000019-NA) Are the backlighting LEDs Blue, Red, switchable? Description says blue, then says red
response: Normally it should be red, I don't know why the discription says blue, but the 'MX red' should also definitely be with red LED lights. Also, its not switchable.

context: you can play ps 1 games on the original ps2, can they be played on the ps2 slim?
response: Yes, it plays both play station 1-2. Play station 2 needs bigger memory cards..compared to play station 1. It kind of nice, one doesn't have to replace all their play station one games..

context: Best Buy says the depth of the New 3DS XL is 5.12 inches. This says the depth is 120 mm (4.72 inches). Has anyone tried it to confirm it fits?
response: Tested it out on all three generations of 3ds (small original, 3DSXL, New3DSXL), all outfitted with Hori Duraflexi TPU cases and they all fit.

context: Is this a wireless headset?
response: No, it is wired with a 12' cord and a control box with a mic on/off switch and 2 volume control knobs for voice and game effects.

context: I was wondering on a level 1-10 how loud the clicks are? odd question but gaming annoys the girl friend lol
